about_the_game:
With the Transportation Station: Airport tileset, your party can easily take a flight to wherever the action's at. Planes, helicopters, a full airport setup and more are ready for you - buy your ticket and get on board!

The Transportation Station ~ Airport tileset includes:

Ground tiles

Concrete
5 types of tile floors - from plain to detailed
Asphalt
Grass
Grate
Water
Conveyors (for baggage claim areas)
Tables
Ground stripes
and more!

Wall tiles:

White textured wall, metal panels and grates, plus colorful walls you can use to separate gates or other important areas. Also includes autotile windows.

Also includes:

Utility and everyday tiles - Exit signs, fans, restrooms, fire extinguisher, staircases, elevator and other common objects
Plants in circular beds
Floor arrows
Signage
Advertising posters
Airline logos
Monitors and departure screens
Seating
Security area - curved desk, x-ray machines for luggage and people, isolation area
Cordons
Small restaurant and convenience store setup
Runway stripes
Passenger bridge (various angles)
Lots of luggage
Airplane interior - cockpit (various angles), galley kitchen, seats, trays with various contents. Includes parallax-ready windows so you can have clouds, etc going by outside.
Parallax sky backgrounds - plain blue, cloudy, stormy, sunset clouds and eerie green clouds.
More not mentioned here!


Events and Animations:

Fountains
Plane (landed, rolling, no shadow with gear, no shadow without gear)
Plane door overlays. Also includes version that folds open into a mini-staircase for emergency landings.
Doors of various types
Escalator
Elevator
Helicopter with various states
Turnstiles
Runway lights (5 colors)

Terms of Use:

This pack is for use in RPG Maker Series or the engine of your choice.
OK to be used in Commercial projects
Contents can be edited
OK for use in games with gore
OK for use in adult-rated games
